title: Introduction to Stock Markets
description: An introduction to the fundamentals of stock markets, their structure, and importance in the economy.

subModules.subModuleDescription: Understanding the basic concept of stock markets.
Learn about the evolution of stock markets over the years.
Overview of investors, brokers, and institutions.
The process of buying and selling stocks.
Understanding key market indices and their significance.
An overview of the regulations that govern the stock market.
Common terms and jargon used in stock markets.
Different market types: primary, secondary, and more.
How exchanges, clearing houses, and settlement systems work.
Emerging trends and technologies shaping stock markets.

title: Technical Analysis Basics
description: Learn the foundational techniques of technical analysis including chart patterns, indicators, and trend analysis.

subModules.subModuleDescription: The basics and importance of technical analysis.
Understanding various candlestick formations.
How to draw and interpret trend lines.
Identifying key levels on charts.
Using moving averages to smooth price data.
Interpreting volume to confirm trends.
A look at RSI, MACD, and other indicators.
Recognizing head & shoulders, triangles, and more.
Incorporating technical analysis with risk controls.
Applying techniques on real chart scenarios.

title: Fundamental Analysis
description: Evaluate companies and industries by analyzing financial statements and economic factors.

subModules.subModuleDescription: Understanding income statements, balance sheets, and cash flow statements.
Delving into revenue, expenses, and profitability.
Examining assets, liabilities, and equity.
Interpreting cash inflows and outflows.
Learn to calculate and interpret ratios.
Assessing company performance within its sector.
The role of leadership in company success.
Discounted cash flow, multiples, and other methods.
Understanding competitive advantages.
Real-world examples of fundamental analysis in action.

title: Advanced Technical Analysis
description: Enhance your technical analysis skills with advanced charting techniques and proprietary indicators.

subModules.subModuleDescription: Exploring advanced patterns beyond the basics.

Analyzing volume patterns for market insight.

Identifying divergences between price and indicators.

From order placement to execution.
